name: Aoki Ookami to Shiroki Mejika
summary: Aoki Ookami to Shiroki Mejika was first released in 1985. Players become Temujin, who has just become 20, and fight to unify the Mongolian plains. After uniting the plains, you are renamed Genghis Khan and proceed to conquer Eurasia. Grow rich and conquer all you come across.

name: Aozora Meikyuu
summary: Aozora Meikyuu is a short Romance Visual Novel with focus on a cute girl.

name: AoF Chess Club 2.0
summary: AoF Chess Club is a multiplayer online chess game and community exclusive to steam members. A one time fee provides an access key which grants one player a life time membership to the game and community. AoF Chess Club can be played through any web browser.

name: AoF World Online
summary: AoF World Online is a single/multiplayer fantasy online experience where you unravel the mystery behind an illusive force threatening Fasaria and her 3 moons.

name: Aoki Densetsu Shoot!
summary: Aoki Densetsu Shoot! is a Japanese anime produced by Toei Animation between November 9, 1990 and December 22, 1991 on the Fuji TV television network; there were fifty-eight episodes. The game has an exhibition mode, an anime-style story mode, and a variety of options, which is entirely in Japanese, so literacy in this language is strongly recommended for quality gameplay. Once the game begins, the action progresses in a side view, similar to an arcade soccer game.

name: Aoi Blink
summary:
Based on a TV anime series (from the grandfather of manga Osamu Tezuka), Blue Blink is a cute platformer that manages to find its place among the crowd. The game is divided up into different areas, each represented by a map screen. Within these areas, you can choose your route to the end (by exiting levels at certain points). Throughout each area you have to find a 'master key' allowing you access to the boss - this can be hard to locate at times and requires lots of shooting at blank areas of screen just in case.

Control of your character is original - on each stage you have three characters which you can choose between, with the CPU controlled ones following behind you like some bizarre congo line. The characters are preset and vary from stage to stage, and each one has different attributes. For example, some have very high jumping ability, whereas others are poor at jumping but have spread-shot weapons. Once you have found the master key and reached the final level in the area, you are entered into a boss battle, where you sit astride the titular donkey and attempt to fight your way to the next area.

name: Ao Zora to Nakama Tachi: Yume no Bouken Plus
summary: Ao Zora to Nakama Tachi: Yume no Bouken Plus is an Action game, developed and published by MTO, which was released in Japan in 2003.

name: Aoki Gentyouhishi
summary:
Let’s return in the times of great empires when the legendary Mongolian Emperor Chingishan conquered half of the world. Now you have the opportunity to re enact his success. Welcome to the 10th century China.

The game reminds of a series of Romance of 3 Kingdoms games but the graphics are surprisingly better and the sound is really breathtaking. Koei has developed a nice game play as well.

name: Ao Oni
summary: Hiroshi and his three friends, Takuro, Takeshi, and Mika, decide to visit an abandoned mansion that is rumored to be haunted. They come across a blue monster that chases them around the mansion.

name: Ao Zora to Nakama Tachi: Yume no Bouken
summary: Ao Zora to Nakama Tachi: Yume no Bouken is an Action game, developed and published by MTO, which was released in Japan in 2002.

name: Aokana: Four Rhythms Across the Blue
summary: Aokana: Four Rhythm Across the Blue is a romance visual novel in which the player assumes the role of Masaya Hinata. Much of its gameplay is spent on reading the story's narrative and dialogue. The text in the game is accompanied by character sprites, which represent who Masaya is talking to, over background art. Throughout the game, the player encounters CG artwork at certain points in the story, which take the place of the background art and character sprites. The game follows a branching plot line with multiple endings, and depending on the decisions that the player makes during the game, the plot will progress in a specific direction.

name: Ao Oni 2
summary:
The officially licensed sequel to the RPG Maker horror game Ao Oni.

Long ago, a certain school in the outskirts of town was suddenly closed.
Nowadays, no one knows the reason why it was suddenly closed.
But there was a certain rumor going around.
They said that a blue monster appeared in that abandoned school building

name: Aozora Under Girls!
summary: Idol battle card game released on iOS and Android devices.

name: Aotearoa
summary:
The Fish of Māui. The Land of the Long Cloud. Aotearoa. An entire continent of untamed wilds, and the last place on Earth where dinosaurs still roam. If only you'd come ashore under better circumstances...

A piece of interactive fiction written by Matt Wigdahl.

name: Ao no Exorcist: Genkoku no Labyrinth
summary: Ao no Exorcist: Genkoku no Labyrinth is a visual novel mixed with an RPG-style combat game developed by Netchubiyori and published by Namco Bandai Games, based on the manga Blue Exorcist.

name: Aoi Uchuu no Bouken
summary: Adventure game developed by Leben Pro in 1985.

name: Aoi Umi no Tristia
summary:
The future of "Tristia", lies in your hands... The PC based adventure game Aoi no Tristia, from the popular character designer "Komatsu Eji" and famous voice actors like "Kawasumi Ayako" is finally coming to PlayStation2™.

The game combines the invention of various items and the development of a city in an SLG portion, and an adventure portion with lots of characters interacting. Furthermore, all new event illustrations have been added and the operation interface has greatly been improved.

name: Aoitenryuu: The Arcade
summary: Aoitenryuu: The Arcade is a puzzle game created by DigiCube.

name: AO Tennis
summary: Australian Open licensed tennis game

name: Aoi Tori
summary: Shiratori Ritsu, the sole male at Kirihara Academy for Girls and its priest, protects the school from demons but finds his sanity tested by the arrival of a new student, the one-hundred-year-old vampire Mary Harker, and a call from the devil, questioning his purpose in life.

name: Aoi's Alternate World Escape
summary: A role-playing game from tokagemori.

name: Aoki Ookami to Shiroki Mejika: Genchou Hishi
summary:
The home port for the Famicom of Genghis Klan II: Clan of the Grey Wolf.

Pick your scenario, increase production and prepare your military for fighting over all of Eurasia.

name: AO International Tennis
summary: AO International Tennis is the most authentic, community-focused tennis game ever. Make use of comprehensive PlayFace, Stadium Creator, and other customisation features to put a photo-realistic version of yourself in your local tennis competition. Then put yourself up against the greats, including Rafael Nadal, Angelique Kerber, and up-an-coming heroes such as Naomi Osaka and Hyeon Chung.

name: Aonatsu Line
summary: Tatsumi and his childhood friends Miki and Chihiro talked every day about what they would do during the upcoming summer vacation. By chance, they befriended the overly-honest ojou-sama Yui, who transferred to their school since she admired the co-education system, as well as kouhai Kotone, who had failed to make lasting friendships after trying too hard to fit in. This new group of five friends (?) began to plan for a memorable bittersweet summer vacation that happens only once in a lifetime.

name: Aozora Under Girls: Karsome Irony
summary: "Aozora Under Girls - Karsome Irony" is a unique VR rhythm game (RhythmGame) based on the operating modes of various popular rhythm games on the market. The game has been licensed by SQUARE ENIX's well-known IP "Girls under the Blue Sky", so we have created a special customized "Aozora Under Girls - Karsome...

name: AOS Manager
summary: Aos Manager is Esports(AOS,MOBA) Manager Simulator. Team up to win the tournament and use various tactics. Plan a PickBan according to the abilities of the players. It's not complicated, it's a game that's faithful to the basics.

name: Aokana: Four Rhythms Across the Blue Extra1
summary: Mashiro thought that she has finally reached the happy end. However, she was barely passing her classes. She lost completely in a sweets battle to Rika and Arika. On top of that, Misaki and Asuka declared that they are Masaya’s lovers!? At this rate, her dear senpai would be taken from her, she’ll have to repeat a year, and Mashiro Udon would go out of business!? Mashiro’s mother, Botan, suddenly suggested that she and Masaya go on an overnight date. She declared that she’ll make a tasty bento for him and dress up nicely. With the help of the others, she trained really hard to up her feminine qualities before the date. Will they reach the true happy end!?

name: Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm 4th Anniversary Box
summary:
Includes:
1. Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm - Perfect Edition
2. Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm EXTRA 1
3. Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm - Vocal & Sound Collection
4. Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm EXTRA 1 Vocal & Sound Collection
5. Koi to Senkyo to Chocolate - The Best
6. Koi to Senkyo to Chocolate Original Soundtrack
7. Bonus music CD (crossing way/rays of the sun/The absolute ~Kuuiki no Shihai-sha)

"Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm - Perfect Edition" includes the new scenes that were previously exclusive to the Vita/PS4/Switch releases.

name: AO Tennis 2
summary: Released to coincide with the Australian Open, the first major tennis tournament of the year, AO Tennis 2 offers an unprecedented level of depth and an extensive range of customization options for a tailor-made gameplay experience. In the brand-new narrative-driven career mode, you’ll be able to dominate the court, build your reputation, climb to the top and become a Tennis legend!

name: Aokana: Four Rhythms Across the Blue Extra2
summary: Aokana: Four Rhythms Across the Blue Extra2 is a visual novel that follows the events after the original Aokana, now focused on the character Misaki Tobisawa.

name: Aokana: Four Rhythms Across the Blue - Limited Edition
summary:
The story of Aokana plays in a world where science finally did it and invented anti-gravity shoes! With the dreamlike ability to freely fly through the skies, a form of sport called Flying Circus became popular, where athletes soar through the air to score points.

Slip into the role of Masaya, a former competitor, that encounters the new transfer student Asuka who strives to learn how to fly. Get involved in the Flying Circus sports club, support the ambitious girls and eventually end up with your own head in clouds!

Aokana - Four Rhythms Across the Blue [Limited Edition] includes:
- Aokana - Four Rhythms Across the Blue Game
- Artbook (100-pages)

name: Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm: HD Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:
- Game: Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm: HD Edition
- Graphic Book
- Vocal Disc
- Soundtrack

name: Ao Oni 3
summary:
Ao Oni 3 is the third entry in the Ao Oni series.
You can play as four characters: Hiroshi, Mika, Takuro, and Takeshi. All of their stories start in the same way. They are on a field trip to an island, but the ship they were on got wrecked, and Hiroshi, Mika, Takuro, and Takeshi find themselves stranded on the island, alone. Soon after, they realize that the island is inhabited by the Ao Oni.

name: Ao
summary:
AO is a puzzle game developed by Second Dimension for the NES.

You control a brick in this 2D world, which is tricky as you really need to think in 3D. The brick takes up 2 spaces when it's laying on its side and 1 space when it's standing up. This is important because you'll need to maneuver through some tricky mazes without falling off of the edge. Don't worry if you do, though, you have unlimited lives!

name: Aoi Sora no Neosphere
summary: A sequel of Tristia of the Deep-Blue Sea from Kogado Studio(Kumasan Team). Set in the Neosphere kingdom that fly in the air by ancient E technology. Neosphere kept going to ruin after world union war. And then, Nanoca was called to rebuild the kingdom.

name: AOD: Art of Defense
summary: AOD is a new gameplay in the traditional tower defence genre. You must protect your base from waves of approaching enemies. Build and improve your towers and units and destroy your enemies in any way you can. Don't be weak, destroy them all, show who's in charge!

name: Aoi Shiro
summary:
The Seijou Girls’ Academy Kendo Club is traveling to Shoushinji for a Summer training camp. Near there is an island, Urashima, where legend has it a demon extermination took place long ago.

They arrive around the time of a festival which honors a god that is worshipped by the people of Urashima; it celebrates the onitaiji and ensure another year of health for the people. Around the time of the festival, the weather around Urashima worsens and storms will come.

A few days into their training, Osanai Shouko finds a girl washed up on the shores near the location of the training camp. She cannot speak and doesn’t seem to know much about herself...

name: Aonatsu Line: Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Game: Aonatsu Line
B2 Tapestry "Miki Kousaka”
Original Soundtrack
Acrylic Key Chain "Yui Nakategawa"
Set of Mini Autograph Cards

name: Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm IF 01: Minamo Shirase
Aopii
summary: Two teenagers deal with mental health problems and school.

name: AOFrost
summary:
AOFrost is a server based on "Argentum Online"
With more than 13 uninterrupted years in its development.
Enter a world full of adventures and become the best!

name: Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm Extra1S
summary: Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm Extra1S is an expanded port of the original game, now featuring new scenes.

name: Aonatsu Line
summary: Censored port of the PC release.

name: Aoi
summary: This is a 2d platform adventure exploration game that combines platform jumping and straightforward fighting. Players will gradually find the lost memory and uncover the truth of this fantastic world with AOI.

name: Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm Extra2S
summary: Aokana: Four Rhythms Across the Blue Extra2S is an expanded port of the original game, now featuring new scenes.

name: Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm Extra1+2S
summary: Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm Extra1+2S is the official Mashiro after story for Aokana.Experience even more Aokana in 1440p!

name: Ao Oni 3D
summary: Unreal Engine 5 Remake of the "Ao Oni" RPG maker game.

name: Aotu World
summary: Aotu World is a fast paced strategy RPG. Full of tactical battles, trendy & colorful outfits, mini games, and more!

name: Aoi Shiro: HD Remaster
summary: Japanese adventure game. Aoi Shiro is an adventure game that sets stage in both the modern real world and a mythical world. Aoi Shiro takes place in the same universe as its predecessor, Akai Ito.

name: Aohri's Uprising
summary: Embark on an adventure, driven by vengeance, to hunt down your former god and put an end to his reign to restore balance to the world!

name: Aojuji Hospital: Tokyo Eidolic Anatomy Division
summary: A Japanese horror novel adventure set in Japan in 1999. Confront the mysterious events and anatomize the paranormal!

name: Aonar
summary: This is an immersive cinematic storytelling experience based on Scottish folklore. Become a part of the lighthouse keeper's story, and take a journey with him on the Scottish Isles. This is an exploratory application.

name: A One Rabbit Open Slay
summary:
A One Rabbit Open Slay is a single Boom map for Doom 2 (MAP01) using the OTEX texture pack as a base. The wad does utilize UMAPINFO, so you will need to run it in a port that supports the format. MAPINFO and a few other enhancements were made for GZDoom as well, so that can also be used. PrBoom+ UM, Woof!, DSDA Doom, and GZDoom were used for testing.

The main objective here is slightly different in that you need to deliver presents to three Christmas trees located throughout the map. Press the "use" key next to one of these trees to drop off the gifts. Once they have all been delivered, return to your sleigh!

name: Ao-Don DS: Hanabi no Goku & Hanabi no Takumi
A Once Glorious City
summary: Large temple complex using Egyptian textures from Rogue/Q1MP2, featuring somewhat nonlinear gameplay. The map source and a few texture wads are included.

name: AOA Academy
summary: You found a letter from the A.O.A academy, claiming that you have been accepted into their academy. This surprised you, since you've never attempted to enroll in any academy. Not only that, this letter also contained the number of your old friend, Ashley. Determine to face your new future in AOA.

name: Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm Extra1P
summary: A port of Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm Extra1S for the PlayStation 4 with enhanced image and sound quality.

name: Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm Extra2P
summary: A port of Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm Extra2S for the PlayStation 4 with enhanced image and sound quality.

name: Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm Extra1+2P
summary: A bundle that includes Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm Extra1 and Extra2 in one package, featuring the side stories between Mashiro and Misaki.

name: Ao to Ao no Sekai
summary: Ran and Ao are brothers. Apparently, Ao is being bullied at school...

name: AO: Containment Breach
summary: AO: Containment Breach is a Procedurally Generated, Level Building, Semi-Auto-Battling, Rouge-lite, Horror hybrid. Fight and Contain AOs as you travel through the Terra AO facility. During "Dives" scavenge for Materials to Craft unique Weapons, and Upgrades.

name: AOD
summary: Arrival of DeadIt is a third-person horror game about survival and death. There is a witty and beautiful girl who is always on the verge of life and death. Don't panic, don't be afraid.

name: Aokaki
summary: Aokaki is a fast-paced 2D platformer where you play as an isopod ronin. Explore fun and challenging levels while battling against the forces of the evil Shogun in this bug inhabited pixelart world.

name: Aoki Shinjuku
summary:
Shinjuku, 2017. Sharp rise in temperature resulted in flood of huge territories.
Deck runs an "information store" and gets a request to investigate a "NOKIA" program. At the same time a big package is delivered that turns out to be a girl who awakens from Cold Sleep and remembers only Shinjuku of 20th century prior to the huge flood...

name: Aooni
summary: Challenge yourself while being chased by fear! A horror puzzle action adventure! The legendary horror game "Ao Oni" has evolved and come back to life!

name: Aotenjo: Infinite Hands
summary: The Mahjong Roguelike. Aotenjo is an deckbuilder where you will use Mahjong styles all over the world to beat innate threats, play different Patterns and combos, reach the "bottom" of Aotenjo, and discover ancient secrets....

name: Ao Oni X
summary:
"There is a sealed tunnel deep in the mountains. Beyond it lies an abandoned village, one from which visitors never return."

After hearing this mysterious urban legend, our protagonists decided to visit an abandoned village on their vacation to test their courage. To their surprise, they find that the village isn't abandoned at all. In fact, it seems quite ordinary...

name: AOL Girls Museum
summary:
AOL Girls Museum (AOLGIRLS.WAD) is a PWAD for Doom II.

The museum displays erotic images of women that were shared in AOL chatrooms between the years of 1994 and 1998.

name: Aooni.io
summary: An online battle royale spin off of the "Ao Oni" series. Released in Japan as "Ao Oni Online"

name: Ao Oni R
summary: The 'R' in Ao Oni R can stand for a lot of things - such as reboot, remake, or retelling, but at its core it is a labor of love. It is the Ao Oni experience everyone knows and loves, having been rebuilt from the ground up in RPG Maker VX Ace to expand upon the original games ideas while giving it a fresh coat of paint. New story elements and areas, graphics, music, sound, puzzles, expanded character backgrounds as well as multiple endings exist in Ao Oni R while still keeping the principles of the original, such as a low amount of dialogue when possible and the possibility of a fast play through.

name: Aooni: The Horror of Blueberry Onsen
summary: Challenge yourself while being chased by fear! A horror puzzle action adventure! A completely new version of the legendary horror game "Ao Oni"!

name: Aooa
summary: A game about using a phone to travel to weird and unsettling places.

name: Aoihana
summary: Aoihana is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: AO3dle
summary: AO3dle is an online game where players must guess which character or tag has more works on the fanwork website Archive of Our Own.

name: AO3dle
summary: Guess the Mystery Fanfic! Test your AO3 knowledge in this daily challenge where you identify fanfictions by their tags, summaries, and metadata. A new puzzle every day for fanfiction lovers!

name: Aonaran Nevaeh
summary: Aonaran Nevaeh is a first-person psychological horror puzzle experience focused on exploration, observation, and environmental problem-solving. Investigate a quiet suburban block, interpret cryptic signals, and complete a session-based run where mistakes trigger escalating manifestations.
